rook.api.transport.consumer

Class DeserializingFilteringUnicastMessageConsumer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • rook.api.transport.consumer.DeserializingFilteringUnicastMessageConsumer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProxyUnicastMessageConsumer<GrowableBuffer>, UnicastMessageConsumer<GrowableBuffer>

    public class DeserializingFilteringUnicastMessageConsumer<T>
extends Object
implements ProxyUnicastMessageConsumer<GrowableBuffer>
    Filters and deserializes the incoming UnicastMessage by group and by the sending service ID. The purpose of this class is to be able to easily separate message filtering and application logic.
    Author:
    Eric Thill

                                                    UnicastMessageConsumer<T> consumer,
                                                    Deserializer<T> deserializer)
        FilteringUnicastMessageConsumer constructor
        Parameters:
        filterFrom - The "from" service ID that must match for the message to be forwarded to the underlying consumer. A null value will allow all "from" fields through.
        consumer - The underlying consumer
